messages.message:
Questions from Renre
• Users starting to work on projects and running docs in their apps.
• But the platform admins and owners can’t see what’s happening, because users are by default funnelled into `My Workspace`
• are we able to prevent users using a My Workspace?
• Why: because, as a platform owner, i want to see everything that that is being worked on in my platform and consuming units.
@hannah - FYI
To answer your question, the product does not currently provide a way to prevent users from using My Workspace
I’ll create a ticket I suppose, but I wonder if this is something other enterprises will ask for too.

actually i spoke too soon :sweat_smile:  we have this capability already in the IB platform, but we’ve never tested it in AI Hub

yes, let’s track in an EPD ticket!

We can't prevent users from using My Workspace (and don't want to), but an admin has access to all personal workspaces and all contents within the personal workspaces so that they can monitor activity as needed. Think about this as the equivalent of a "My Drive" for google.
Ah @Serena we shouldn't be using that. It's not tested and may break many other things that rely on the personal workspace in AI Hub
thank you, but how can an Admin see the personal workspaces? I’m logged in now looking
That might be the URL with the new info architecture, so actually it should be https://aihub.instabase.com/hub?workspace=<username>
thank you, what is the username?

the username is converted from the email by replacing `+` with `.` and `@` with `_`
• ex: `<mailto:serena.wang+aihubsandbox@instabase.com|serena.wang+aihubsandbox@instabase.com>` -> `serena.wang.aihubsandbox_instabase.com (http://aihubsandbox_instabase.com)`
